about.description:
zfp is an open source C/C++ library for compressed numerical arrays
that support high throughput read and write random access. zfp also
supports streaming compression of integer and floating-point data,
e.g., for applications that read and write large data sets to and
from disk. zfp is primarily written in C and C++ but also includes
Python and Fortran bindings.
about.summary: Library for compressed numerical arrays that support high throughput read and write random access

name: zfpy
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: zfpy
    version: 0.5.5
source:
    patches:
        - 100-update-cmake.patch
    sha256: 6a7f4934489087d9c117a4af327fd6495ea757924f4df467b9c537abf8bd86c4
    url: https://github.com/LLNL/zfp/archive/0.5.5.tar.gz
build:
    number: 1
    script: source ${RECIPE_DIR}/build_zfpy.sh
    string: py37he1dd5e6_1
requirements:
    build:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 0_gnu
        - binutils_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.34 h0f24833_5
        - binutils_linux-ppc64le 2.34 heaf459e_20
        - bzip2 1.0.8 h6eb9509_2
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - cmake 3.17.0 hfb1cb51_0
        - expat 2.2.9 hb209c28_2
        - gcc_impl_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h8635c71_6
        - gcc_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h96fe1e1_20
        - gxx_impl_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h822a55f_6
        - gxx_linux-ppc64le 8.4.0 h96fe1e1_20
        - krb5 1.17.1 hc2f0735_1
        - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.34 h0f24833_5
        - libcurl 7.71.0 he8386ad_0
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 h01e2fff_0
        - libgcc-ng 8.4.0 hdd5993f_6
        - libgomp 8.4.0 hdd5993f_6
        - libssh2 1.9.0 h0e66b82_2
        - libstdcxx-ng 8.4.0 h822a55f_6
        - libuv 1.38.0 h6eb9509_0
        - make 4.3 h6eb9509_0
        - ncurses 6.1 hf484d3e_1002
        - openssl 1.1.1g h6eb9509_0
        - rhash 1.3.6 h14c3975_1001
        - tk 8.6.10 h151fe60_0
        - xz 5.2.5 h6eb9509_0
        - zlib 1.2.11 h6eb9509_1006
    host:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
        - _openmp_mutex 4.5 1_llvm
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - cython 0.29.20 py37hb809cae_0
        - ld_impl_linux-ppc64le 2.34 h0f24833_5
        - libblas 3.8.0 16_openblas
        - libcblas 3.8.0 16_openblas
        - libffi 3.2.1 hb209c28_1007
        - libgcc-ng 8.4.0 hdd5993f_6
        - libgfortran-ng 8.4.0 h822a55f_6
        - liblapack 3.8.0 16_openblas
        - libopenblas 0.3.9 ha38281c_0
        - libstdcxx-ng 8.4.0 h822a55f_6
        - llvm-openmp 10.0.0 h1bb5118_0
        - ncurses 6.1 hf484d3e_1002
        - numpy 1.16.5 py37hcee8f07_0
        - openssl 1.1.1g h6eb9509_0
        - python 3.7.6 haf90cd5_5_cpython
        - python_abi 3.7 1_cp37m
        - readline 8.0 hf8c457e_0
        - sqlite 3.32.3 hd61ad8c_0
        - tk 8.6.10 h151fe60_0
        - xz 5.2.5 h6eb9509_0
        - zfp 0.5.5 hb209c28_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h6eb9509_1006
    run:
        - libgcc-ng >=8.4.0
        - libstdcxx-ng >=8.4.0
        - numpy >=1.16.5,<2.0a0
        - python >=3.7,<3.8.0a0
        - python_abi 3.7.* *_cp37m
        - zfp 0.5.5 hb209c28_1
test:
    imports:
        - zfpy
about:
    description: 'zfp is an open source C/C++ library for compressed numerical arrays

        that support high throughput read and write random access. zfp also

        supports streaming compression of integer and floating-point data,

        e.g., for applications that read and write large data sets to and

        from disk. zfp is primarily written in C and C++ but also includes

        Python and Fortran bindings.

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/LLNL/zfp
    doc_url: http://zfp.readthedocs.io/en/release0.5.5/
    home: https://computation.llnl.gov/projects/floating-point-compression
    license: BSD 3-Clause Modified
    license_family: BSD
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: Library for compressed numerical arrays that support high throughput
        read and write random access
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - GarrettDMorrison
        - ToreAad
        - hmaarrfk
        - kmpaul
        - lindstro
